outline:
1. to be like, resemble
    1. (Qal) to be like, resemble
    2. (Piel)
      1. to liken, compare
      2. to imagine, think
    3. (Hithpael) to make oneself like
    4. (Niphal)
kjv_def: compare, devise, (be) like(-n), mean, think, use similitudes.
strongs_def: to compare; by implication, to resemble, liken, consider
